name: Simply Gladiators
description:
Basic information

Simply Gladiators is a 2D brawling game located in the Roman antique times when gladiators were still fighting for their freedom. A fun round-based game, where your only objective is to simply kill all the enemies.

Currently controls are not visible in-game, so here they are:

  • Moving - A & D
  • Attacking - Arrow keys
  • Jumping - Spacebar

Making of the game

It was very interesting and a challenge in general. What made it especially interesting, is that we used some new features when making this game, and we actually had a time limit. Oh and also this was our first game ever.

Participating in creating the game was:

Aleksi 'Teascade' Talarmo - Programmer, Lead design & Art (mostly)

Jens Pitkänen - Lead Programmer, Design
